>
[Ceremony of the Strengthened Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=2786) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ceremony of the Evened Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=2777)

</column>

---

Your exoskeleton's weapons are even more potent. If you have a claws unarmed attack, it gains the [deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait. If you have a branch unarmed attack, it gains the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) and [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) traits.
